info.title: Identity Service API
info.description: Use this API to manage identities.

post.summary: Create a new identity in an account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account in which the identity belongs in.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Possible values: SystemData, PrivateData, CompanyData, UserPermissions.

requestBody.description: Information of the identity to create.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account in which the identity belongs in.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account in which the identity belongs in.

404.description: Could not find an identity with the specified id.

post.summary: Upload a picture for an identity.
post.description:
headers: {'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'}.
File maximum size: 5 MB.
File name maximum length: 255 char.
Supported types: png, jpg, gif.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account in which the identity belongs in.

parameters.name: identityId
parameters.description: The identity id which refers to the identity to update.

picture.title: IFormFile
picture.description: The byte stream array of the picture.

delete.summary: Remove a picture from an Identity.
delete.description: The deletion of the picture is permanent and cannot be recovered.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account in which the identity belongs in.

parameters.name: identityId
parameters.description: The identity id which refers to the identity to update.

countries.title: IEnumerable`1
countries.description: The list of countries according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-3

countryCode.title: String
countryCode.description: The country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-3

status.title: String
status.description:

<see cref="T:Genetec.SaaS.Iams.IdentityService.Business.Constants.IdentityStatus">Active, Inactive, Deleted</see>

creationOnBehalf.description: Identifier of the requester of the creation

siteId.description: ClearID Site ID of where this identity is located.

customFieldType.description: Type of the custom field. Possible values: Text, Numeric, Boolean, DateTime, Decimal, Date.

externalSyncSourceId.description: The id of the external synchronization configuration. Optional.

identities.description: The list of identities which matched the filters.

continuation.title: String
continuation.description: The url to use to get the next page of identities.

identityId.title: String
identityId.description: A unique id to identify the identity.

eTag.title: String
eTag.description:
The hash version of the identity.
Must be specified to update an identity.

status.title: String
status.description:
The state of the identity.
Possible values: <see cref="T:Genetec.SaaS.Iams.IdentityService.Business.Constants.IdentityStatus">Active, Inactive, Deleted</see>.

isSCSaaS.title: Nullable`1
isSCSaaS.description: Is associated and synchronized from a Genetec One user.

lastModifiedByIdentityId.description: IdentityId of the user who last modified this identity.

isDeleted.title: Boolean
isDeleted.description: If true, the identity was deleted and cannot be modified
